summary: She\'s mean and nasty, what I wanted in a female Orc follower. I really tried to make her visually stimulating but there is not much chance on making a pretty Orc. You will just have to be the judge. She is marriageable should you play a male Orc PC. She is located at the Hroldan Inn.
descriptionHtml:
Osira the Castrator -Orcish Follower-

Yes I gave her a funny name as it sets her apart! :) 

This is probably my last attempt at making a pretty Orc. This was a project I started a week ago as a replacer and I really tried to make her visually stimulating. There is not much more I could do for her but you will just have to be the judge on that. She is marriageable should you play a male Orc PC or you just like hard women. She is located/sandboxed at the Hroldan Inn. 

She is a Combat Warrior One Handed and will use bow, sword and shield or dual flurry. I set her at level 40 Calculated and she should continue to rise with the player to 100. Magic use is limited to healing and Ironflesh. She is equipped with two enchanted Orcish daggers and no clothing (NAKED). She is also set to essential because she is so hard hearted. 

Location: Old Hroldan Inn 
Coloring and Physical Attributes: I customized her hair color, skin tone and of course made changes to facial structure and makeup coloring. I used Vanilla hair on her because honestly there really aren\'t any better Orc hairs IMHO. 

Mods used in my images- 
Face: Better Females by Bella - Makeup Option 1 and No Shine Option: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Skin: Glossy Skin for all female bodymod - v05 - No Gloss http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=26003
id=12273
Her Orcish Damascus Scimitars are from Bob\'s Armory. (Please endorse his work, it is absolutely incredible!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12060
Navetsea\'s CBBEv3 body textures were used in my images as well (and as usual), highly endorsed!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
Orcish Armor and Boots - Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M by MAK: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
Shield: Witcher 2 Shield Pack. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7328 

Thanks as always for checking out my mod and downloading her. Endorsements are always welcome and appreciated if you like her!!!
author: FalmerBane
